channel.title: Vscode on Coding notes
channel.description: Recent content in Vscode on Coding notes

item.title: Create dotnet core sln with class library plus xunit tests with cli for vscode
item.description: Create a folder for the solution and cd into it A solution (sln file) is required to be able to have projects referencing others. mkdir Bustroker.Notes cd Bustroker.Notes Create solution The sln file is created directly in the folder it’s run. dotnet new sln -n Bustroker.Notes Create class library project and add it to the solution A folder is created, containing the project dotnet new classlib -n Bustroker.Notes dotnet sln add Bustroker.
